mapper.select: select menu_no , menu_price , menu_name from menu where business_no=#{business_no} and menu_using='Y'

select nvl(to_char(menu_no),'0') as "menu_no" ,business_no as "business_no" ,menu_name as "menu_name" ,nvl(to_char(menu_price),'0') as "menu_price" ,nvl(to_char(menu_cost),'0')as "menu_cost" ,menu_category_code as "menu_category_code" ,menu_using as "menu_using" from menu where business_no=#{business_no} and menu_name=#{menu_name}
select business_name from business_info where business_no=#{business_no}
